casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Sylvester Ray ANDREWS, Jr. and Trayvon Markel Powell Moody No. 62P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 9, 2018 Mr. James R. Grant, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Andrews, Sylvester Ray (Jr.) Mr. Jarvis John Edgerton, IV, Attorney at Law, for Moody, Trayvon Markel Powell Mr. Amar Majmundar, Senior Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina Ms. Olga Vysotskaya de Brito, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina Mr. Robert A. Evans, Jr., District Attorney, for State ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 13th of March 2018 by Defendant (Trayvon Markel Powell Moody) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of May 2018."
